snippet: Mr. Wreszin wrote biographies of Dwight Macdonald and other American antiwar activists.
abstract: Michael Wreszin, biographer of radical 20-century American intellectuals who were prominent antiwar activists, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wreszin wrote biographies of Dwight Macdonald and other American antiwar activists.

headline.seo: Michael Wreszin, Biographer of American Radicals, Dies at 85
headline.main: Michael Wreszin, Biographer of American Radicals, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Michael Wreszin, 85, Biographer of American Radicals
